about_the_game:
A full-scale playtest of the preliminary Early Access version is currently underway. If you'd like to learn how to access it through the demo app, please check our Discord for instructions.

Drill to the Core


Manage a team of miners, carriers, and guards through hazardous missions to extract minerals and power the drill platform. With indirect unit control, you have to plan your descent carefully and manage your resources wisely - every decision counts as you race against time to prevent climate collapse!

Deploy Your Defenses


Each night, aliens will attack the drill platform. Strategically fortify the drilling zone with turrets and upgrade your defenses to repel increasingly monstrous threats! Experiment with turret layouts to maximize their effectiveness, and incorporate new technologies you discover during the run.

Develop New Strategies


Every mission is unique with randomized monsters, restrictions, and technologies you will have at your disposal. Adapt swiftly and allocate your resources wisely. Successful missions unlock new mechanics and upgrades. Plan your approach carefully at the start of each mission and choose the right workers, buildings, and turrets for the job!

name: Drill Core Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 710, 1 GB or AMD Radeon R7 240, 1 GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Corporate greed meets strategic planet-mining in Drill Core! Drill to the heart of planets while managing workers, researching cutting-edge tech, and fortifying against alien attacks. Will you prioritize efficiency and risk your workers' safety, or focus on defense for survival?
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian, Serbian
*languages with full audio support
